title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2374/98 of 3 November 1998 concerning the authorisation of new additives in feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2374/98 of 3 November 1998 concerning the authorisation of new additives in feedingstuffs (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The substances belonging to the group 'Enzymes` and listed in the Annex to this Regulation may be authorised according to Directive 70/524/EEC as additives in animal nutrition under the conditions laid down in that Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 November 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
